attributes.action: bestow a posthumous knighthood upon Augustus Welby Northmore Pugin
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Look at the design at the Palace of Westminster, the objects produced by the Arts and Crafts Movement and William Morris, look at the designs produced by many of the most important architects and designers of the last 200 years and you will see the imprint of the genius of Pugin.  A man driven by his love of his religion and his attempt to reintroduce the Gothic style to Britain, his greatest triumph was his work at Westminster which saw him overlooked afterwards as the architect Barry accepted his knighthood and the plaudits.

Now is the time to right the wrong and award a posthumous knighthood to AWN Pugin.

rejection.details: We are no longer accepting petitions for posthumous honours, as they are not generally allowed under the rules - see http://www.honours.gov.uk/faqs.aspx
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
